# IT Solutions Company Website - Project Instructions

This is a highly optimized website for an IT solutions company targeting Calgary, Alberta, Canada.

## Project Overview
- **Target Market**: Calgary, Alberta, Canada
- **Industry Focus**: IT solutions for oil & gas, dealerships, restaurants
- **Services**: Custom software, private apps, websites, design tools
- **Tech Stack**: Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, optimized for performance

## Key Requirements
- Super fast loading times with performance optimization
- Dark theme by default with light theme toggle
- SEO optimized for "IT solutions Calgary Alberta"
- Professional B2B design with animations
- Contact form sending to evgeniiborvinskii@gmail.com
- Responsive design for all devices

## Development Guidelines
- Prioritize performance and Core Web Vitals
- Use semantic HTML for SEO
- Implement proper image optimization
- Follow accessibility standards
- Maintain clean, readable code structure
